Title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Paul Dichter, Jessie Nickson-Lopez (executive story editor), Paul Dichter (staff writer), Kate Trefry (staff writer)
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: An ailing Will opens up to Joyce -- with disturbing results. While Hopper digs for the truth, Eleven unearths a surprising discovery.
